meanings.definition: A type of shellfish with a dark blue or black shell.
meanings.sent1: The mussels were delicious at dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a plate of mussels at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The mussels in the soup were so happy to be swimming together.
meanings.sent4: The mussels clung to the rocks like a tightly knit community.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the mussels cooking filled the kitchen with a savory aroma.

meanings.definition: The edible flesh of this shellfish.
meanings.sent1: He savored the taste of the mussels in the pasta dish.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a special sauce to accompany the mussels.
meanings.sent3: The mussels giggled as they were being dipped in butter.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was contagious, spreading through the room like mussels in a pot.
meanings.sent5: The mussels melted in his mouth, releasing a burst of flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of freshwater or marine bivalve mollusk with a dark shell.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the mussels in the river for her research.
meanings.sent2: The diver discovered a bed of mussels on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The mussels threw a party in their shells, inviting all their friends.
meanings.sent4: The mussels stood out in the sand like jewels in a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The mussels filtered the water, keeping it clean for other creatures.
